name: Celted
description:
Welcome to the world of celtic knots! 

Swap tiles to connect shuffled pieces, start with small symmetric ones and go wild and creative with big and free form! 

Launch the game, click Play and check out different game settings:

  • Different field sizes make single ornament solution vary from less than a minute and up to half an hour
  • Symmetry helps you feel the field, but can you tie a completely random knot?
  • Hints - are you ready to play without looking at the solved knot? Disable them and let's see how far can you go!
  • Specials spice up the game with different mechanics. As soon as you feel confident with simple tiles - give it a try
  • Infuriating - It started as a bug first. I started playing a  perfect (as I thought) symmetric pattern, but some corner piece was another kind. It still did the job, but the visual inconsistence was mildly infuriating. So I made a feature out of it just for fun. Enjoy.

Want a competition? 

Сhallenge your friends to beat your score on completed pattern! But you must be skilled enough and play with Hints disabled. When you complete a puzzle without hints you will be asked if you want to share it. Select your options, click Copy code and share the code in text messages or social media!  Codes could be activated in Challenge section from the Main Menu. 

Choose Speed challenge if you like to play fast and make decisions on the go!

Or take a Strategy one if you like to plan the whole field shuffle ahead and then make just the minimal amount of efficient moves!

A challenge code could look like this:

WEfH4tpcBkmp9NUyb1U62uHRGimibN9UYtz4qV43Pm969rrE0WB7sA==

Try it yoursellf!
